Literature.Title: Short Antimicrobial Peptide Derived from the Venom Gland Transcriptome of Pamphobeteus verdolaga Increases Gentamicin Susceptibility of Multidrug-Resistant Klebsiella pneumoniae.
Literature.Author: Salinas-Restrepo C, Naranjo-Duran AM, Quintana J, Bueno J, Guzman F, Hoyos Palacio LM, Segura C

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(20-30% Inhibition=30µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(10-20% Inhibition=30µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(30-40% Inhibition=30µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(20-30% Inhibition=30µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=200µM)
